      • getTree

        public NavTree getTree()
        get the tree of that this index indexes
        Returns:
        NavTree the tree in question

      • getBestNode

        public NavNode getBestNode()
        get the "best" node of that this index indexes. "best" is defined as the single node most fitting the request as passed into computeActiveNodes.
        Returns:
        NavNode the best node

      • splitUrlPrefixes

        public static java.lang.String[] splitUrlPrefixes(java.lang.String urlIn)
        Splits the given url string at the /. Returns the parts in an array. For example, given "/network/users/details" this method will return {"/network", "/users", "/details"}
        Parameters:
        urlIn - url string to be split.
        Returns:
        the parts in an array.

      • computeActiveNodes

        public java.lang.String computeActiveNodes(java.lang.String url,
                                  java.lang.String lastActive)
        Given a URL, compute the active nodes for the URL, altering the state of the class. Pass in the most recently Active URL to be used as a fallback if necessary.
        Parameters:
        url - string of form /foo/bar/baz
        lastActive - the last computed ActiveNode URL
        Returns:
        String the URL computed

      • isNodeActive

        public boolean isNodeActive(NavNode node)
        simple method to ask if a given node is in the active set
        Parameters:
        node - to test
        Returns:
        boolean if the node is active or not
